timeline.bodyText: The recordProgramProvisioned method call already returns the latest RunRecordMeta being recorded. You shouldn't need to read it again.
timeline.author: chtyim

timeline.bodyText: In fact, the profileId, should already be in the systemArgs variable. You don't need the run record at all
timeline.author: chtyim

timeline.bodyText: move this to a private function to have better separation of concern
timeline.author: chtyim
chtyim

timeline.bodyText: Is this only for unit test? If it is, define it in the test class
timeline.author: chtyim

replies.bodyText: It's not only for tests. This metric will be read by the metrics writer extension and published to stackdriver.
replies.author: rmstar
